summary: This bill, the Technology Grants to Strengthen Domestic Mining Education Act of 2025, aims to bolster domestic mining education through a grant program administered by the Secretary of Energy. It defines key terms like "mining school" and "mining profession." The Secretary will award competitive grants to mining schools to recruit and educate the next generation of mining professionals. A Mining Professional Development Advisory Board is established to evaluate grant applications and make recommendations. The bill authorizes $10 million annually from 2026-2033 and repeals the Mining and Mineral Resources Institutes Act.
